mapper.sql: id, owner, source, customerId, fullname, appellation, email, mphone, job, birth, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contacts (id, owner, source, customerId, fullname, appellation, email, mphone, job, birth, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address ) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{editby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{edittime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactsummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextcontacttime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update tbl_contacts
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_contacts set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerId = #{customerid,jdbcType=CHAR}, fullname = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appellation = #{appellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mphone = #{mphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=CHAR}, createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, editBy = #{editby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, editTime = #{edittime,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contactSummary = #{contactsummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nextContactTime = #{nextcontacttime,jdbcType=CHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contacts (id, owner, source, customerId, fullname, appellation, email, mphone, job,createBy,createTime,nextContactTime,address,editTime,editBy) values (#{id}, #{owner}, #{source}, #{customerId}, #{fullName}, #{appellation}, #{email}, #{mPhone}, #{job},#{createBy},#{createTime},#{nextContactTime},#{address},#{editTime},#{editBy})
mapper.select: select c.id,u1.name as owner,v1.value as source,cs.name as customerId,c.fullname,v2.value as appellation, c.email,c.mphone,c.job,c.birth,u2.name as createBy,c.createTime,u3.name as editBy,c.editTime, c.description,c.contactSummary,c.nextContactTime,c.address from tbl_contacts c join tbl_user u1 on u1.id = c.owner join tbl_dic_value v1 on v1.id = c.source join tbl_customer cs on cs.id = c.customerId join tbl_dic_value v2 on v2.id = c.appellation join tbl_user u2 on u2.id = c.createBy join tbl_user u3 on u3.id = c.editBy where cs.id =#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contacts (id, owner, source, customerId, fullname, appellation, email, mphone, job, birth, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address) values (#{id}, #{owner}, #{source}, #{customerId}, #{fullName}, #{appellation}, #{email}, #{mPhone}, #{job}, #{birth}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{editBy}, #{editTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{address})
mapper.select: select c.id,u1.name as owner,v1.value as source,cs.name as customerId,c.fullname,v2.value as appellation, c.email,c.mphone,c.job,c.birth,u2.name as createBy,c.createTime,u3.name as editBy,c.editTime, c.description,c.contactSummary,c.nextContactTime,c.address from tbl_contacts c join tbl_user u1 on u1.id = c.owner join tbl_dic_value v1 on v1.id = c.source join tbl_customer cs on cs.id = c.customerId join tbl_dic_value v2 on v2.id = c.appellation join tbl_user u2 on u2.id = c.createBy join tbl_user u3 on u3.id = c.editBy where c.id =#{id}
mapper.update: update tbl_contacts set owner = #{owner}, source = #{source}, customerId = #{customerId}, fullname = #{fullName}, appellation = #{appellation}, email = #{email}, mphone = #{mPhone}, job = #{job}, birth = #{birth}, editBy = #{editBy}, editTime = #{editTime}, description = #{description}, contactSummary = #{contactSummary}, nextContactTime = #{nextContactTime}, address = #{address} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select c.id,u1.name as owner,v1.value as source,cs.name as customerId,c.fullname,v2.value as appellation, c.email,c.mphone,c.job,c.birth,u2.name as createBy,c.createTime,u3.name as editBy,c.editTime, c.description,c.contactSummary,c.nextContactTime,c.address from tbl_contacts c join tbl_user u1 on u1.id = c.owner join tbl_dic_value v1 on v1.id = c.source left join tbl_customer cs on cs.id = c.customerId join tbl_dic_value v2 on v2.id = c.appellation join tbl_user u2 on u2.id = c.createBy join tbl_user u3 on u3.id = c.editBy where cs.name like concat('%',#{customerId},'%') order by c.fullname desc
